member.name: T:MySql.Data.Entity.SqlFragmentVisitor
member.summary: Visitor for SqlFragment and derived classes, useful for postprocessing and optimizations.

member.name: T:MySql.Data.Entity.ReplaceTableNameVisitor
member.summary: Visitor to replace old table names with new table names. Used as part postprocessing of the code for fusing nested selects.

member.name: M:MySql.Data.Entity.SelectGenerator.TryFlatteningGroupBy(MySql.Data.Entity.SqlFragment)
member.summary: If input sqlFragment is a group by structure, is flattened to remove some nested correlation queries.

member.name: M:MySql.Data.Entity.SqlGenerator.TryFusingSelect(MySql.Data.Entity.InputFragment)
member.summary: If current fragment is select and its from clause is another select, try fuse the inner select with the outer select. (Thus removing a nested query, which may have bad performance in Mysql).
member.param: The fragment to probe and posibly optimize
member.returns: The fragment fused, or the original one.

member.name: M:MySql.Data.Entity.SqlGenerator.TryPromoteToLike(System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression,System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression,System.String)
member.summary: Examines a binary expression to see if it is an special case suitable to conversion to a more efficient and equivalent LIKE sql expression.

member.name: T:MySql.Data.Entity.MySqlConnectionFactory
member.summary: Used for creating connections in Code First 4.3.

member.name: T:MySql.Data.Entity.MySqlMigrationCodeGenerator
member.summary: Class used to customized code generation to avoid dbo. prefix added on table names.

member.name: T:MySql.Data.Entity.MySqlMigrationSqlGenerator
member.summary: Implementation of a MySql's Sql generator for EF 4.3 data migrations.

member.name: T:MySql.Data.Entity.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:MySql.Data.Entity.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:MySql.Data.Entity.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:MySql.Data.Entity.Properties.Resources.ConnectionMustBeOfTypeMySqlConnection
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The connection parameter must reference an object of type MySql.Data.MySqlConnection.

member.name: P:MySql.Data.Entity.Properties.Resources.NoStoreTypeForEdmType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There is no store type corresponding to the EDM type '{0}' of primitive type '{1}'..

member.name: P:MySql.Data.Entity.Properties.Resources.TypeNotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The underlying provider does not support the type '{0}'..

member.name: P:MySql.Data.Entity.Properties.Resources.WrongFunctionResultType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Result type of a function is expected to be a collection of RowType or PrimitiveType.
